FuncDef: This command within the SAP ingress and egress policer-overrides contexts is used to override the sap-ingress and sap-egress QoS policy configured rate parameters for the specified policer-id.
CLIs: rate { rate | max } [ cir { rate | max } ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the policer instance metering rate for the PIR leaky bucket, in kilobits per second. The integer value is multiplied by 1000 to derive the actual rate in bits per second. Values-1 to 2000000000.

Specifies the overriding value for the policy-derived profiling rate of the policer, in kilobits per second. The integer value is multiplied by 1000 to derive the actual rate in bits per second. Values-0 to 2000000000.

Uses the maximum policer rate, equal to the maximum capacity of the card on which the policer is configured. If the policer rate is set to a value larger than the maximum rate possible for the card, then the PIR or CIR used is equivalent to max.
